item.title: Making NPCs Agressive?
item.dc:creator: @jandascape90 jandascape90
item.description:
@jandascape90 wrote:

Go into npchandler.java, and search:

npcs[i].MaxHit = (int)Math.floor((npcs[i].MaxHP /

For example mine is set to:

npcs[i].MaxHit = (int)Math.floor((npcs[i].MaxHP / 1000));

There, change the number depending on what fraction of the monsters hp you wish for it to hit.
Then go to npc.cfg and change the hitpoints of the monster to like 100.
So if your number is set to 1000 like mine, the npc’s will only hit 0’s unless it has 1000 hp or higher then it will hit 1’s and up.
Hope that clears some of that up for you.

~jAnDa
